name: cacheGet
description: Gets an object that is stored in the cache.

params.name: id
params.description: The ID value assigned to the cache object when it was created

params.name: region
params.description: CF10+ The name of the cache region where the object was stored. Applies only to ACF.

params.name: cacheName
params.description: Lucee4.5+ The name of the cache where the object was stored. Applies only to Lucee.

params.name: throwWhenNotExist
params.description: Lucee4.5+ Enable/Disable throwing an error if element not exists

lucee.notes:
For Lucee the method signature is:
`cacheGet( id [, throwWhenNotExist [, cacheName ] ] )`
however it does support passing a cacheName in as the second argument for compatibility with ACF.

examples.title: Simple Example
examples.description: Puts an element in the cache and then retrieves it.

examples.title: Script Syntax - Named Cache
examples.description: CF10+ Puts an element in a named cache and then retrieves it.
